body_html:
OS Platform and Distribution : Windows 7 Professional
TensorFlow version 1.4.0 from pip
GPU model and memory : currently running on CPU (i5) , 8GB RAM
Rest are not relevant to my case
Exact command to reproduce:

I was creating a decoder rnn with GRU cell. Here is the function:

def nl_decoder(self):
		
		with tf.variable_scope("NL_Decoder"):
			self.decoder_nl_cell = tf.contrib.rnn.GRUCell(self.nl_dec_size)
			
			self.iter_decoder_nl = tf.constant(0)
			self.iter_decoder_nl_test = tf.constant(0)
			
			train_decoder = tf.while_loop(self.nl_decoder_condition,self.nl_decoder_function, [ self.iter_decoder_nl, tf.zeros([1,self.nl_dec_size]) , tf.ones([self.nl_dec_size])],\
			shape_invariants = [self.iter_decoder_nl.get_shape(), tf.TensorShape([None,self.nl_dec_size]),\
			tf.TensorShape([self.nl_dec_size])])

		return train_decoder[1][1:]

body:
OS Platform and Distribution : Windows 7 Professional
TensorFlow version 1.4.0 from pip
GPU model and memory : currently running on CPU (i5) , 8GB RAM
Rest are not relevant to my case
Exact command to reproduce:

I was creating a decoder rnn with GRU cell. Here is the function:

````
def nl_decoder(self):
		
		with tf.variable_scope("NL_Decoder"):
			self.decoder_nl_cell = tf.contrib.rnn.GRUCell(self.nl_dec_size)
			
			self.iter_decoder_nl = tf.constant(0)
			self.iter_decoder_nl_test = tf.constant(0)
			
			train_decoder = tf.while_loop(self.nl_decoder_condition,self.nl_decoder_function, [ self.iter_decoder_nl, tf.zeros([1,self.nl_dec_size]) , tf.ones([self.nl_dec_size])],\
			shape_invariants = [self.iter_decoder_nl.get_shape(), tf.TensorShape([None,self.nl_dec_size]),\
			tf.TensorShape([self.nl_dec_size])])

		return train_decoder[1][1:]
